title: Chicken Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add chopped onion and sauté until golden. 3. Add garlic and ginger and cook briefly. 4. Add tomato and turmeric, cook until soft. 5. Add chicken and salt, mix well. 6. Add water and simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil in a wok. 2. Add garlic and sauté lightly. 3. Add vegetables and stir fry on high heat. 4. Season with salt and cook until crisp-tender.

title: Chickpea Tomato Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and ginger. 3. Add tomato and turmeric and cook until thick. 4. Add chickpeas and salt. 5. Add water and simmer.

title: Egg Bhurji
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric and salt. 4. Pour beaten eggs and scramble until cooked.

title: Grilled Fish
steps: 1. Marinate fish with lemon, garlic, and salt. 2. Heat pan with oil. 3. Grill fish on both sides until cooked.

title: Aloo Sabzi
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add turmeric and potatoes. 3. Add salt and water. 4. Cover and cook until potatoes are soft.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add tofu and fry lightly. 3. Add vegetables and salt. 4. Stir fry until done.

title: Okra Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and okra. 3. Cook until okra is tender and lightly crisp.

title: Vegetable Soup
steps: 1. Boil water with vegetables. 2. Add salt. 3. Simmer until vegetables are soft.

title: Shrimp Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add shrimp and cook briefly. 3. Add bell pepper and salt. 4. Stir fry until shrimp is cooked.

title: Eggplant Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric and eggplant. 4. Add salt and water. 5. Cook until soft.

title: Pumpkin Sabzi
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add pumpkin and turmeric. 3. Add salt and water. 4. Cook until tender.

title: Cabbage Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and cabbage. 3. Cook until soft.

title: Mutton Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and ginger. 3. Add tomato and turmeric. 4. Add mutton and salt. 5. Add water and slow cook.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add chicken and cook until done. 3. Add bell pepper and salt. 4. Stir fry briefly.

title: Radish Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add radish and turmeric. 3. Add salt and water. 4. Cook until tender.

title: Tomato Soup
steps: 1. Boil tomatoes in water. 2. Blend and return to heat. 3. Add garlic and salt. 4. Simmer briefly.

title: Fish Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric. 4. Add fish and salt. 5. Add water and simmer.

title: Chickpea Salad
steps: 1. Mix boiled chickpeas and chopped cucumber. 2. Add lemon juice and salt. 3. Toss well.

title: Vegetable Omelette
steps: 1. Beat eggs with salt. 2. Heat oil and sauté vegetables. 3. Pour eggs and cook until set.

title: Carrot Cabbage Sabzi
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and cook briefly. 3. Add carrot and cabbage. 4. Add salt and cook until tender.

title: Broccoli Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil in pan. 2. Add garlic. 3. Add broccoli and stir fry on high heat. 4. Season with salt.

title: Cauliflower Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric. 4. Add cauliflower and salt. 5. Add water and cook until soft.

title: Chicken Tomato Stew
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add chicken and salt. 4. Add water and simmer until cooked.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice Style
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add vegetables and stir fry. 3. Add salt and cook until lightly crisp.

title: Egg Curry
steps: 1. Boil eggs and set aside. 2. Heat oil and sauté onion. 3. Add garlic and tomato. 4. Add turmeric and salt. 5. Add eggs and simmer.

title: Pumpkin Soup
steps: 1. Boil pumpkin with onion and garlic. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Return to heat and add salt.

title: Fish Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add fish and cook gently. 3. Add spring onion and salt.

title: Potato Tomato Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric and potatoes. 4. Add salt and water. 5. Cook until potatoes are soft.

title: Chickpea Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic. 3. Add chickpeas and salt. 4. Cook until lightly crisp.

title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and turmeric. 3. Add vegetables and salt. 4. Add water and cook until tender.

title: Shrimp Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric. 4. Add shrimp and salt. 5. Simmer briefly.

title: Cucumber Salad
steps: 1. Slice cucumber. 2. Add lemon juice and salt. 3. Toss well.

title: Okra Tomato Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add okra and salt. 4. Add water and cook until tender.

title: Tofu Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato. 3. Add turmeric and tofu. 4. Add salt and water. 5. Simmer gently.

title: Chicken Soup
steps: 1. Boil chicken with onion and garlic. 2. Add salt. 3. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Cabbage Soup
steps: 1. Boil cabbage with onion and garlic. 2. Add salt. 3. Simmer until soft.

title: Eggplant Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add eggplant. 3. Cook until soft and lightly browned.

title: Mutton Stew
steps: 1. Boil mutton with onion and garlic. 2. Add salt. 3. Cook until tender.

title: Vegetable Medley
steps: 1. Heat oil. 2. Add vegetables. 3. Stir fry and season with salt.

title: Fish Tomato Stew
steps: 1. Boil tomato, onion, and garlic. 2. Add fish and salt. 3. Simmer gently.

title: Potato Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and potatoes. 3. Cook until golden.

title: Chickpea Soup
steps: 1. Boil chickpeas with onion and garlic. 2. Add salt. 3. Simmer until thick.

title: Vegetable Omelette Roll
steps: 1. Beat eggs with salt. 2. Sauté vegetables. 3. Pour eggs and cook flat.

title: Cauliflower Stir Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add cauliflower. 3. Stir fry until cooked.

title: Chicken Dry Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and chicken. 3. Cook until dry and done.

title: Vegetable Clear Soup
steps: 1. Boil vegetables in water. 2. Add salt. 3. Garnish with spring onion.

title: Tofu Stir Fry Indian Style
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté onion. 2. Add garlic and tofu. 3. Cook until lightly crisp.

title: Radish Soup
steps: 1. Boil radish with onion and garlic. 2. Add salt. 3. Simmer until soft.

title: Shrimp Garlic Fry
steps: 1. Heat oil and sauté garlic. 2. Add shrimp and salt. 3. Fry until cooked.
